Black Nike Air Max 95 | JD Sports Malaysia
excerpt:
Step out in a street legend with these men’s Air Max 95 trainers from Nike. In a JD-exclusive Black, Anthracite and Iron Grey colourway, these classic kicks have a layered textile, synthetic and leather upper for a lightweight yet durable wear. They feature a secure lace-up front and padded ankle collar for locked-in comfort. Underfoot, the foam midsole houses visible Air unis to the heel and forefoot for an ultra-responsive ride, while the rubber outsole provides essential grip. Finished up with Picante Red Swoosh branding.

Care & Material

Leather

Black

title: Blue Vans Old Skool Tapered Women's | JD Sports Malaysia
Black Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 39 | JD Sports Malaysia
excerpt:
Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 39

Men’s Road Running Shoes

ENERGIZED FOR MILES.

Running is your daily ritual, with every step taking you closer to your personal goal. Let the Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 39 help you ascend to new heights, whether you’re training or jogging, with its intuitive design. More lightweight up top than the Pegasus 38 and ideal to wear in any season, it has a supportive sensation to help keep your feet contained, while underfoot cushioning and double Zoom Air units (1 more than the Peg 38) give you an extra pop to your step. Your trusted workhorse with wings is back. Time to fly.

Total Comfort

Extra padding at the tongue and collar helps keep your feet feeling comfortable. We also placed engineered mesh-which is stronger and more flexible than regular mesh-throughout the top for lightweight breathability.

Supportive Steps

Flywire technology is integrated with a midfoot band for total support that helps keep your feet in place.

Snap, Run and Pop

Nike React technology is a lightweight, durable foam that delivers a smooth, responsive ride. We paired it with a Zoom Air unit at the forefoot and the heel for an energized feel.

Smooth Transitions

The heel shape is designed to optimize landing, helping you easily transition from heel to toe. We paired it with thick foam for a responsive ride.

Tongue is separated from the upper to give room for different foot shapes.

Waffle-inspired outsole gives you excellent traction.

Grooves on the rubber sole allow for natural motion.

Colour:

Black
content:

title: Black Puma x MARKET Slipstream | JD Sports Malaysia
adidas Ultraboost 1.0 Women's | JD Sports Malaysia
excerpt:
From a walk in the park to a weekend run with friends, these adidas Ultraboost 1.0 shoes are designed to keep you comfortable. An adidas PRIMEKNIT upper gently hugs your feet, and BOOST on the midsole cushions from the first step to the last mile. The Stretchweb outsole flexes naturally for an energised ride while Continental™ Rubber gives you the traction you need to keep that pep in your step.This shoe’s upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.

• Runs small. Order 1 Size larger than your usual size.

• Lace closure

• adidas PRIMEKNIT textile upper

• Fitcounter moulded heel counter

• BOOST midsole

Care & Material

100% Synthetic

title: Purple Nike React Infinity Run Flyknit 3 Women's | JD Sports Malaysia
excerpt:
Nike React Infinity Run Flyknit 3

Women’s Road Running Shoes

STAY RUNNING WITH SOFT, STABLE SUPPORT.

Still our most tested shoe. Still designed to help keep you running. The Nike React Infinity Run 3 has the soft, stable feel with the smooth ride that will carry you through routes, long and short. A breathable upper is made to feel contained, yet flexible. We even added more cushioning to the collar for a soft, protected feel. Keep running, we’ve got you.

A Secure, Breathable Flex

We added Flyknit throughout the upper, creating specific zones geared towards optimal breathability, flexibility and containment. The result is a cool feel that helps your foot feel secure, while letting it move without restriction. It still has Flywire technology for support through the midfoot.

Smooth and Steady

Nike React technology is a lightweight, durable foam that delivers a smooth, responsive ride. Shaped like a rocker, the foam provides support for the 3 phases of a runner’s stride. It offers flexibility when your foot rises off the ground, a smooth ride when your foot is moving forward and cushioning at ground contact. Its wide shape provides a mor stable ride, helping release energy with every step.

Cushioned Feel, Higher Heights

Less material between the insole and midsole means you’re closer to the foam. This helps create a more responsive experience. The foam itself has a higher height, providing a plush feel.

A hybrid tongue combines a sock-like feel with the adjustability of a traditional design.

Soft padding along the collar provides a cushioned touch point.

Increased rubber at the outsole helps deliver traction and durability.

Colour:

Purple
content:

title: Grey adidas Originals Ozweego Junior | JD Sports Malaysia
excerpt:
Level up your street-ready rotation with these juniors’ Ozweego sneakers from adidas Originals. In a JD-exclusive Quiet Crimson colourway, these ’90s-inspired kicks have a lightweight mesh upper with smooth suede overlays for added support. They have a tonal lace closure with plush padding around the ankle for a locked-in fit, and sit on a spongy EVA midsole for a cushioned step. With a tough rubber outsole underfoot for grippy traction, they’re finished up with signature adidas branding throughout.

Care & Material

Leather & Textile Upper/ Synthetic Sole

Colour:

Grey

title: White Puma Slipstream Heritage | JD Sports Malaysia
excerpt:
Go forth and rock the streets in iconic style with the PUMA Slipstream Heritage. Born in the ‘80s, revered in the 2000s, and re-designed today for your contemporary needs, these classic shoes feature all the key elements of the B-ball silhouette without compromising on the original roots.

Refreshed with new heritage pack features, these classic shoes blend a perfect mix of vintage style and modern utility to keep you a step ahead of the rest. Featuring perforated and distressed leather, these shoes offer maximum breathability and make sure you sweep through the day comfortably. Define legendary style in your way with the PUMA Slipstream Heritage.

PUMA Slipstream Heritage features:


  
    Leather, synthetic, and corduroy upper provides maximum comfort.
  
  
    Translucent hangtags and repeat branding add a luxe touch.
  
  
    Rubber outsole offers excellent grip and traction.
  


Care & Material

Leather Upper/Synthetic Sole

Colour:

White

title: Orange Nike Pico 5 Infant | JD Sports Malaysia
excerpt:
Nike Pico 5 Lil

Toddler Shoes

Follow the trail of pawprints left by your little critter when they rock the Nike Pico 5. Furry Swoosh logos and a happy animal friend bring these shoes to life while an easy-to-use strap secures them fast. Slip them on and let your kiddo imagine they can run as fast as a fox when they head out to play.

Animal Style

As part of our Lil collection, these shoes are inspired by the wonderful world of fun that lives inside every kid’s imagination. Pawprints, an animal face and fur-like details help spark your little one’s creativity and sense of adventure.

Built to Last

Real and synthetic leather offer a durable design and help provide a supportive feeling for little feet that are constantly moving.

Get Strappy

A simple strap helps your kiddo take these shoes on and off all by themselves.

    Perforations on toe

title: White Vans Authentic Women's | JD Sports Malaysia
excerpt:
Keep it real with these men’s Authentic trainers by Vans. Originally called the ‘44’, the Authentic was the first deck shoe sold by the Van Doren Rubber Company back in ‘66. Built with a durable canvas upper in a stand-out true white colourway, they feature a secure lace up fastening and signature contrasting stitching. Sat on a chunky midsole, which keeps your foot cushioned every step of the way, they’re equipped with Vans’ signature Waffle tread for optimum grip both on and off the board. Finished with Vans branding to the sidewalls and heel.

Colour:

White Product Code: 16588233_jdsportsmy

title: Blue Puma Small World Jogger Set Infant | JD Sports Malaysia
excerpt:
Inspired by the tiniest creatures that call this planet home, the fun and playful Small World Jogger Set is made for the littlest humans among us. Tiny tots will look adorable in the matching set, which comes in super-soft French terry for their delicate skin and features a bold graphic print on the chest with sweet little critters. Loaded with cuteness and packed with practicality, the pieces are also easy to get on and off in a hurry thanks to the button placket on the shoulder and elasticated waist.


  
    Recycled Content: Made with at least 20% recycled material as a step toward a better future

    Button placket on the shoulder
  
  
    Ribbed crew neck
  
  
    Ribbed elasticated waist with internal drawstring
  
  
    Side pockets
  
  
    Ribbed cuffs
  
  
    Graphic rubber PUMA branding on the chest
  
  
    PUMA Cat Logo on the left leg
  
  
    Rib: 96% cotton, 4% elastane

content:
Inspired by the tiniest creatures that call this planet home, the fun and playful Small World Jogger Set is made for the littlest humans among us. Tiny tots will look adorable in the matching set, which comes in super-soft French terry for their delicate skin and features a bold graphic print on the chest with sweet little critters. Loaded with cuteness and packed with practicality, the pieces are also easy to get on and off in a hurry thanks to the button placket on the shoulder and elasticated waist.


  
    Recycled Content: Made with at least 20% recycled material as a step toward a better future
  
  
    Regular fit
  
  
    Button placket on the shoulder
  
  
    Ribbed crew neck
  
  
    Ribbed elasticated waist with internal drawstring
  
  
    Side pockets
  
  
    Ribbed cuffs
  
  
    Graphic rubber PUMA branding on the chest
  
  
    PUMA Cat Logo on the left leg
  
  
    Rib: 96% cotton, 4% elastane
  
  
    Shell: 68% cotton, 32% polyester
  


Colour:

Blue

title: White New Balance 302 Women's | JD Sports Malaysia
excerpt:
Thanks to its blend of performance qualities and understated, casual elegance, the classic tennis shoe is a timeless style fixture. The CT302 expands the everyday wearability of the classic court silhouette, with an infusion of exaggerated proportions and unexpected details. Using a 1980s on-court model, the CT300, as a launching point, the CT302 adds a stacked height midsole, an outsized take on the classic cup outsole design and ‘N’ logo, and a rubber toe wrap extending from the outsole, along with the use of curved and wavy lines throughout the design.


  
    Leather upper
  
  
    Stacked height midsole
  
  
    Heritage ‘N’ court logo
  
  
    Tip wrap inspired by ProCourt design
  
  
    Miniature text branding at midsole
  


Colour:

White

title: White adidas Originals ZX 8000 | JD Sports Malaysia
excerpt:
Once designed to help runners go faster and farther, these adidas ZX 8000 Shoes are all about the cosy vibes. Plush synthetic material, exposed foam seams and modern colours wrap your feet in a fresh look. Classic details like the Torsion System and cushioning keep them rooted in ’80s running tech.

• Textile upper

• Textile lining

title: White New Balance 480 | JD Sports Malaysia
excerpt:
Inspired by our original BB680 – game-worn by players for blacktop shooting sessions and parquet title runs alike – the latest NB revival gives you a enduring classic with simple, clean style. Soft, full-grain leather with a flextended saddle teams up with a sturdy heel counter for stability. An Ortholite insert is designed for added comfort and moisture control. Authentic, in-game hoops style drops now.

Features


  
    Soft, full-grain leather
  
  
    Sturdy heel counter for stability
  
  
    Ortholite insert for added comfort and moisture control
